segment.source: Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA) can analyze issues for desktop, mobile, and IoT devices; and servers.
segment.target: Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA) can analyze issues for desktop, mobile, and IoT devices; and servers.

segment.source: This section includes topics that describe how to perform specific tasks using WPA.
segment.target: This section includes topics that describe how to perform specific tasks using WPA.

segment.source: Opening an ETL file in WPA and opening WPA from an assessment.
segment.target: Opening an ETL file in WPA and opening WPA from an assessment.

segment.source: Select graphs, zoom in and out on a time interval, and highlight a selected time interval.
segment.target: Select graphs, zoom in and out on a time interval, and highlight a selected time interval.

segment.source: Customizing data tables, searching and filtering data, and creating and applying a view profile are some of the many topics featured in the Step-by-Step Guide.
segment.target: Customizing data tables, searching and filtering data, and creating and applying a view profile are some of the many topics featured in the Step-by-Step Guide.

segment.source: Open any recording captured in Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) or the Assessment Platform created in WPA.
segment.target: Open any recording captured in Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) or the Assessment Platform created in WPA.

segment.source: Sort by a column, change the selection column, make a column a graphing elements, and freeze column are some of the methods described.
segment.target: Sort by a column, change the selection column, make a column a graphing elements, and freeze column are some of the methods described.

segment.source: Highlight a selection to keep the time interval selected even when you click a different location on the Analysis tab.
segment.target: Highlight a selection to keep the time interval selected even when you click a different location on the Analysis tab.

segment.source: Recover profile information you forgot to save, but also save the recovered information to a new profile, which you can apply to view the corresponding analysis.
segment.target: Recover profile information you forgot to save, but also save the recovered information to a new profile, which you can apply to view the corresponding analysis.

segment.source: Zoom in on a Time Interval
segment.target: Zoom in on a Time Interval

segment.source: Zoom in (repeatedly) to make a time interval in a graph bigger.
segment.target: Zoom in (repeatedly) to make a time interval in a graph bigger.
